text: Scheana Marie, the waitress whom Eddie cheated on Brandi with, now claims that he tried to reignite their relationship after he began seeing LeAnn! Do you believe it? Eddie Cibrian is no saint, that ’ s for sure, but could he possibly have been foolish enough to try and cheat on now - wife LeAnn Rimes with the same waitress he cheated on ex - wife Brandi Glanville? If the waitress in question, Scheana Marie, is to be believed, the answer is a resounding yes!
